entry.title: New release for Nautical Backup: v2.11.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Update dependency mkdocs-material to v9.6.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/Minituff/nautical-backup/pull/427

  • Update dependency mkdocs-material to v9.6.4 by @renovate in https://github.com/Minituff/nautical-backup/pull/433

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Minituff/nautical-backup/compare/v2.10.10...v2.11.0

entry.title: New release for Nautical Backup: v2.11.2

entry.title: New release for Nautical Backup: v2.12.0
entry.content:
Stop Timeout Environment variable

Nautical will allow the container x amount of seconds to shutdown gracefully before killing the container.

Default: 10 (seconds)

properties STOP_TIMEOUT=10

Stop Timeout Label

Default If Missing: Stop Timeout Environment value (Defaults to 10 seconds)

properties nautical-backup.stop-timeout=10

What's Changed

  • Update minituff/nautical-backup Docker tag to v2.11.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/Minituff/nautical-backup/pull/450
  • Add stop timeout by @Minituff in https://github.com/Minituff/nautical-backup/pull/451

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Minituff/nautical-backup/compare/v2.11.2...v2.12.0
